title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Apr 19 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Apr 19 2022
description:
Ohio Congressman Jim Jordan joins Clay and Buck, discussing wining back the house, the Biden border crisis, flying maskless and the Hunter Biden investigation. Texas Governor Greg Abbott buses illegal immigrants to D.C., and, when that fills up, Delaware. Florida continues to be the centerpiece of freedom in America. Governor DeSantis announces Florida’s special session will include ending Disney’s tax privilege and special exemption status. C&B lively discussion: Where does the word "gerrymandering" originate?

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
